Loan spell at Burnley didn’t pan out as hoped, with the full back making just 10 appearances in all competitions.

Roma want closer to £40m for Salah. Though talks so far have yet to reach a compromise, Liverpool remain keen on bringing him to in. (Echo)

Roma are reluctant to part with their star man, but Salah is believed to be keen on the idea of moving to the Premier League. (Echo)

Liverpool have also held talks with Gelson Martins, and have interest in Douglas Costa, but Salah remains their preferred choice. (Echo)

Chelsea want over £10m in compensation from Liverpool for Dominic Solanke after he helped England win the U20 World Cup. (Evening Standard)

Both clubs are far apart in their valuation, with Chelsea dismissing Liverpool's offer of £3m. (Evening Standard)

Unless the Merseyside club can agree a price, it will go to a tribunal next month. (Evening Standard)

Chelsea were expected to ask for around £8m, but Solanke's role at the U20 World Cup will see them ask for £10m+. (Evening Standard)
